[{"id":"CPPT-1","entityId":"2-1","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"CPPT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Suppress unneeded warning for unset temporary-pool location in templates that do not generate temporaries"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"David Seery"},{"name":"created","value":"1563618704409"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"David Seery"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"ds283"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"ds283"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563958595426"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability"],"valueId":["Usability"],"color":{"bg":"#25beb2","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Fix versions","value":["2019.1"],"valueId":["2019.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["2018.1"],"valueId":["2018.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Translator"],"valueId":["Translator"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7bc3","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"ds283","fullName":"David Seery"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["30"],"valueId":["30m"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"CPPT-21","entityId":"2-44","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"CPPT"},{"name":"summary","value":"When building CppTransport, Bison raises deprecated issue"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alex Maraio"},{"name":"created","value":"1563801219485"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"21"},{"name":"description","value":"

When running the make CppTransport command with the gcc compilers, the following deprecated warning is raised:

translator/parser/bison/y_parser.yy:7.1-36: warning: deprecated directive, use ‘%define api.parser.class {y_parser}’ [-Wdeprecated]
 %define parser_class_name {y_parser}
 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
translator/parser/bison/y_parser.yy: warning: fix-its can be applied.  Rerun with option '--update'. [-Wother]

This warning is raised using the 8.3.0 GNU compilers, and Bison version 3.3.2 when compiling on Chadwick.
The warning message is quite explicit on what the line needs to be replaced with, but as @David Seery's more familiar with the Bison parser, perhaps you can look into this please?

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"David Seery"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"am963"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"ds283"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563812358214"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#e30000","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Fix versions","value":["2019.1"],"valueId":["2019.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["2018.1"],"valueId":["2018.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Translator"],"valueId":["Translator"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7bc3","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"ds283","fullName":"David Seery"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-6","author":"ds283","authorFullName":"David Seery","issueId":"CPPT-21","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

These seem to have been deprecated in Bison 3.3. I'll look into whether we can require this as a minimum version. Ubuntu cosmic still uses a 3.0 series Bison and this (or Linux distros of a similar age) will still be current for a lot of our install base.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563801948750,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
